doc.title: The Holocaust: Colorado Remembers
doc.plot: The documentary film "The Holocaust: Colorado Remembers" provides an example of intolerance taken to extreme levels - the systematic genocide by Nazi Germany during World War II. Through historic photos and the voices of survivors, viewers learn what life was like in the concentration camps and the horror that happens when we (as a people) forget that we are all human. The film ends with a survivor message to future generations.
